articles.description: Watch live coverage as Crystal Palace host Millwall and Preston face Burnley in the FA Cup, plus live text coverage and radio commentary across the other fifth round ties.
articles.title: FA Cup LIVE: Crystal Palace vs Millwall in fifth round - live stream, radio commentary and score updates

articles.description: England's dismal Champions Trophy campaign ends with a sorry seven-wicket defeat by South Africa in Karachi.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025 results: England end with sorry defeat by South Africa

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text updates of Saturday's Scottish football, including Rangers v Motherwell, Dundee v St Johnstone and St Mirren v Celtic.
articles.title: Saturday's Scottish football - radio & text: BBC Sport

articles.description: Follow live text from seven Championship games as Leeds United face West Brom and Middlesbrough take on Derby County.
articles.title: Championship: Blackburn v Norwich, Leeds v West Brom & Oxford v Coventry

articles.description: Milutin Osmajic scores as two-time winners Preston claim bragging rights in Lancashire by sending local rivals Burnley out of the FA Cup in the fifth round.
articles.title: Preston North End 3-0 Burnley: Milutin Osmajic scores as Preston thump rivals Burnley in FA Cup

articles.description: Seven-time world champion Ronnie O'Sullivan withdraws from the next week's World Grand Prix in Hong Kong for medical reasons.
articles.title: Ronnie O'Sullivan: Englishman withdraws from World Grand Prix in Hong Kong for medical reasons

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Crystal Palace vs Millwall in the FA Cup
articles.title: Crystal Palace vs Millwall: FA Cup stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Fenerbahce manager Jose Mourinho has his four-match suspension halved by the Turkish Football Federation on appeal.
articles.title: Jose Mourinho: Fenerbahce boss has four-match suspension halved

articles.description: West Bromwich Albion draw with Championship leaders Leeds United at Elland Road to end the hosts' five-game winning league run.
articles.title: Leeds United 1-1 West Brom: Elland Road draw ends hosts' winning run

articles.description: After three days of testing in Bahrain, McLaren have started as they finished last season, while Lewis Hamilton is positive about the beginning of his Ferrari career.
articles.title: F1 2025 pre-season testing: McLaren impressive and Lewis Hamilton positive
